channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 31A19/31A20/31A21 maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 16, 21:00 UTC  -  Dec 17, 06:00 UTC

Nov 5, 13:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

Start time : 16/12/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 17/12/2025 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable up to 9 hours during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be moving servers in the specified racks from RBX2 to RBX7.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - Room GRA0327A
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 10, 06:00 - 11:00 UTC

Oct 30, 14:24 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

Start time : 10/12/2025 06:00 UTC
End time : 10/12/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may experience up to 5 hours of service unavailability affecting the racks listed below :
GRA0327A05B
GRA0327A07B
GRA0327A07C

During the maintenance window, access to the IPMI (Intelligent Platform Management Interface) will be temporarily unavailable for the racks listed below :
GRA0327A05A
GRA0327A06A
GRA0327A06B
GRA0327A06C
GRA0327A07A
GRA0327A05B
GRA0327A07B
GRA0327A07C

Please note that the maintenance may take less time than expected.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment on the specified racks.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack W01A21 incident notification
item.description:
Nov 17, 11:06 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on the rack W01A21 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 17/11/2025 10:12 UTC
End time : 17/11/2025 11:00 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Nov 17, 10:31 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering in the rack W01A21.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 17/11/2025 10:12 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the rack W01A21 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers located in the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack LIM0311B01A incident notification
item.description:
Nov 17, 08:45 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on the rack LIM0311B01A has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 13/11/2025 13:52 UTC
End time : 17/11/2025 08:45 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Nov 13, 15:11 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Half of the servers are available again.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 13, 15:09 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific rack LIM0311B01A.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 13/11/2025 13:52 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the rack LIM0311B01A are temporarily unavailable.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

Nov 13, 14:29 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the rack LIM0311B01A.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 13/11/2025 13:52 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the rack LIM0311B01A are temporarily unavailable.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [SBG3][Cooling System] - Rack S333B04 maintenance notification
item.description:
Nov 17, 07:50 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 17, 07:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 17/11/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 17/11/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance. Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks G124A02 to G124A19 incident notification
item.description:
Nov 16, 12:58 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers has been resolved.

Start time : 16/11/2025 10:07 UTC
End time : 16/11/2025 12:49 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Nov 16, 11:35 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific racks G124A02, G124A03, G124A04, G124A06, G124A07, G124A08, G124A09, G124A10, G124A11, G124A12, G124A14, G124A15, G124A17, G124A19.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 16/11/2025 10:07 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Servers in the specified racks are no longer able to access the vRack network.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers via vRack network located on the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
